statements: SELECT * FROM train_maintenance;
SELECT train_id, maintenance_cost, maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM train_maintenance WHERE train_id = 123;
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_cost FROM train_maintenance WHERE maintenance_cost > 500;
SELECT train_id, maintenance_date FROM train_maintenance WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT MAX(maintenance_cost), MIN(maintenance_cost) FROM train_maintenance;
SELECT train_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_type, maintenance_cost FROM train_maintenance WHERE train_id = 1 ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_date, train_id, maintenance_cost FROM train_maintenance WHERE maintenance_type = 'Minor' ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM train_maintenance WHERE maintenance_type = 'Major' AND maintenance_cost > 500 ORDER BY maintenance_cost DESC, maintenance_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT train_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date, maintenance_cost FROM train_maintenance WHERE maintenance_cost BETWEEN 300 AND 700 ORDER BY train_id, maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT maintenance_type FROM train_maintenance WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM trains;
SELECT train_id, train_name FROM trains WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Corporation';
SELECT equipment_type, location FROM equipment ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT train_name FROM trains WHERE maintenance_status = TRUE;
SELECT equipment_type, last_maintenance_date FROM equipment WHERE last_maintenance_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM trains WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Railways';
SELECT train_name, manufacturer FROM trains WHERE maintenance_status = TRUE ORDER BY manufacturer DESC;
SELECT train_name, manufacturer, maintenance_status FROM trains WHERE train_id < 100 OR manufacturer LIKE '%Transport%';
SELECT train_name, maintenance_status FROM trains WHERE train_id IN (2, 5, 8);
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE location = 'Depot A' ORDER BY last_maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM trains;
SELECT train_name, manufacturer FROM trains WHERE year_of_manufacture > 2010;
SELECT train_id, train_name, manufacturer FROM trains ORDER BY manufacturer DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, type, quantity FROM equipment WHERE type = 'Engine';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records WHERE cost > 1000 ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM trains ORDER BY train_name DESC;
SELECT train_id, train_name, manufacturer FROM trains WHERE year_of_manufacture > 2005;
SELECT equipment_name, type, quantity FROM equipment WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY equipment_name ASC;
SELECT record_id, asset_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM maintenance_records WHERE cost > 100 ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT t.train_name, e.equipment_name, m.maintenance_type, m.cost FROM trains t JOIN equipment e ON t.train_id = e.equipment_id JOIN maintenance_records m ON e.equipment_id = m.asset_id;
SELECT * FROM assets;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM assets WHERE purchase_cost > 5000;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, purchase_date FROM assets ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM trains WHERE maintenance_cost > 10000;
SELECT equipment_name, purchase_cost FROM equipment WHERE purchase_cost < 2000;
SELECT * FROM assets WHERE asset_type = 'Vehicle' ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT asset_name, purchase_cost FROM assets WHERE purchase_cost > 1000;
SELECT train_name, route_id FROM trains WHERE maintenance_cost > 500 ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT equipment_name, purchase_date, purchase_cost FROM equipment WHERE purchase_cost BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_type = 'Scheduled' AND maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM assets;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name FROM assets WHERE purchase_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM trains ORDER BY year_of_manufacture DESC;
SELECT train_name, manufacturer FROM trains WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Railways';
SELECT equipment_name, location FROM equipment WHERE maintenance_team_id = 1;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM assets WHERE purchase_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT train_name, manufacturer FROM trains WHERE year_of_manufacture < 2000 ORDER BY train_name DESC;
SELECT log_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_type='Scheduled Maintenance' ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT team_name, team_lead, team_size FROM maintenance_teams WHERE team_size > 5 OR team_lead='John Doe';
SELECT equipment_name, location FROM equipment WHERE maintenance_team_id IN (SELECT team_id FROM maintenance_teams WHERE team_size > 10);
